title: SMNTY Classics: All Them Witches
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: All Them Witches
description:
Anney and Samantha cast a spell with Hocus Pocus and The Witches and discuss the depiction of witches in children's movies in this classic episode. Is it all truly just a bunch of hocus pocus?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
